user.title: Set up Sager Weathercaster
user.description: Configure the Sager Weathercaster integration. Select the entities that provide weather data.

data_description.name: Name for this Sager Weathercaster instance
data_description.pressure_entity: Entity providing current atmospheric pressure in hPa
data_description.wind_dir_entity: Entity providing current wind direction in degrees (0-360)
data_description.wind_speed_entity: Entity providing current wind speed in km/h
data_description.wind_historic_entity: Entity providing wind direction from 6 hours ago (optional)
data_description.pressure_change_entity: Entity providing pressure change over 6 hours in hPa (optional)
data_description.cloud_cover_entity: Entity providing cloud cover percentage (0–100 %) or solar illuminance (lx). When a lux sensor is used, the integration converts the reading to cloud cover % using the Kasten & Czeplak clear-sky model.
data_description.raining_entity: Rain sensor: numeric (mm/h) for intensity-based conditions (rainy/pouring), or binary sensor for simple rain detection
data_description.temperature_entity: Entity providing current temperature (for weather entity)
data_description.humidity_entity: Entity providing current humidity percentage (for weather entity)

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Sager Weathercaster
reconfigure.description: Update the sensor entities and name used by Sager Weathercaster.

data_description.name: Name for this Sager Weathercaster instance
data_description.pressure_entity: Entity providing current atmospheric pressure in hPa. Use relative (sea-level) pressure, not absolute station pressure.
data_description.wind_dir_entity: Entity providing current wind direction in degrees (0–360). Use a vector-averaged value, not an instantaneous reading.
data_description.wind_speed_entity: Entity providing current wind speed in km/h. Use a short-term average, not an instantaneous reading.
data_description.wind_historic_entity: Entity providing wind direction from 6 hours ago (optional). Required for wind trend detection (Veering / Backing / Steady).
data_description.pressure_change_entity: Entity providing pressure change over 6 hours in hPa (optional). Required for pressure trend classification.
data_description.cloud_cover_entity: Entity providing cloud cover percentage (0–100 %) or solar illuminance (lx). When a lux sensor is used, the integration converts the reading to cloud cover % using the Kasten & Czeplak clear-sky model.
data_description.raining_entity: Rain sensor: numeric (mm/h) for intensity-based conditions (rainy/pouring), or binary sensor for simple rain detection.
data_description.temperature_entity: Entity providing current temperature in °C (for weather entity and shower/flurry detection).
data_description.humidity_entity: Entity providing current humidity percentage (for weather entity).

error.invalid_pressure_unit: Pressure sensor must report in hPa (or mbar). Select a sea-level (relative) pressure sensor.
error.invalid_cloud_unit: Cloud cover sensor must report in `%` (cloud cover percentage) or `lx` (solar illuminance). Other units are not supported.

data_description.open_meteo_enabled: When enabled, the integration fetches hourly and 7-day forecasts from Open-Meteo (open-meteo.com, free, no API key required). Disabling makes the integration fully local.
